data: Prior to ordering leech therapy, Health Canada Special Access Program Approval is required

Attending provider must complete and sign "Special Access Program Form A - Patient Specific Request", fax the completed form to 613-941-3194, phone the urgent request line at 613-941-2108, and document the time and name of the Health Canada representative granting patient specific approval.  Once approval is obtained, notify inpatient pharmacy. Original signed paperwork should be faxed to pharmacy at local 3545 to facilitate obtaining leech supply
Consider increasing vital sign frequency to a minimal of q4h during leech therapy
Refer to Leech Therapy Guideline in VCH SHOP
q15-30 min during leech therapy. Assess leech to ensure latching on skin
Select a separate leech order per wound site and specify wound site for leech application in order comment
Antimicrobial prophylaxis for aeromonas required during leech therapy. Consult Infectious Disease for recommendation based on patient status
